name: Mortgage Insurance Rental Housing in Urban Renewal Areas
popular_name: Multifamily Rental Projects in Designated Areas - Section 220
objective: To provide quality rental housing in urban renewal areas, code enforcement areas, and other areas designated for overall revitalization.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Housing -- Federal Housing Commissioner
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)

authorizations.text: National Housing Act, as amended, Section 220, Public Law 83-560, 12 U.S.C. 1745(k).

rules_regulations: 24 CFR 220.1 et seq. and the MAP Guide.
